name: Landon's Mannequins Demo
description:
WASD - Controls

The full game should be released in around a month or more this is my first horror game ever. Sorry about any bugs e.g.(options not working, walls clipping) I will fix everything eventually lol. The sound might be a bit buggy too.

I'll take any recommendations for the full game on my Twitter https://twitter.com/KingThe0nly
